tool_description: Extracts fundamental metadata properties from files including file system attributes, basic technical properties, and standard embedded metadata.

file_path.description: Path to the file for metadata extraction

extract_embedded.description: Whether to extract embedded metadata from file headers

include_checksums.description: Whether to calculate file checksums (MD5, SHA256)

error_messages: File not accessible: Cannot read the specified file due to permissions or file not found
Unsupported format: File format is not supported for metadata extraction
Corrupted metadata: File contains corrupted or unreadable metadata sections
usage: Provide file_path and optionally enable extract_embedded and include_checksums for comprehensive basic metadata extraction.

creation_date.description: File creation timestamp in ISO format

modification_date.description: File last modification timestamp in ISO format

embedded_metadata.description: Array of key-value pairs from embedded metadata

md5_checksum.description: MD5 hash of file contents (if include_checksums enabled)

sha256_checksum.description: SHA256 hash of file contents (if include_checksums enabled)
